Name: Hoop the Loop
About the game: Hoop the Loop is a casual VR game where you try to hold your hoop steady so that it does not touch the bar. The game is extremely addicting with a pleasant low-poly style environment that will not burn up your computer. Come and enjoy this unique game that utilizes the best of VR at no cost and no in-app purchases!
Meta Title: Hoop the Loop: Oct 11, 2021, Leo Jiang and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hoop the Loop? Check out the release date (Oct 11, 2021), developer insights from Leo Jiang, and a complete game summary.
